title: Hospitals: The White Mafia (1973) Medical Drama | Full Movie | with subtitles

sources.title: Hospitals: The White Mafia (1973) Medical Drama | Full Movie | with subtitles
sources.description:
Portraits of a pushy surgeon and a nurse with many secrets, in a big city hospital.

Original title: Bisturi, la mafia bianca (Hospitals: The White Mafia)
Director: Luigi Zampa
Writers: Dino Maiuri, Massimo De Rita
Stars: Enrico Maria Salerno, Gabriele Ferzetti, Senta Berger
Genres: Crime, Drama, Thriller
